No one can peep ğŸ‘€ at your private chat any more;ğŸ”’ AppLock can lock System apps: Gallery,  Video, SMS, Contacts, Gmail, Settings, incoming calls and any app you choose. Prevent unauthorized access and guard privacy;ğŸ”’ AppLock has PIN Lockã€Pattern Lock and Fingerprint Lock. choose your favorite style to lock apps . Much safer for you to lock apps . No more worry people may peep the password or pattern. More safe!ğŸ”’ AppLock support screen lock. Prevent strangers from using your phone without your permission.ğŸ”’ AppLock has rich themesï¼šWe have built-in sets of beautiful Pattern and PIN themes for your choice, will continue to update.Tipsï¼šIf you have a phone with a fingerprint reader that is either made by Samsung or is running Android Marshmallow, you can check the box in the App Lock settings labeled "Use fingerprint to unlock"ğŸ‘® Real-Time ProtectionMonitor the new installation and app updating, real-time remind avoiding potential risks, keeping your devices safe.ğŸ—‘ Phone Boost: Speed up your PhoneBoost the speed of your Android phone, clear junk and cache.ğŸ›¡ï¸ Safe lockscreenAppLock secure your phone from intruders with PIN and pattern lock security.ğŸŒˆ Live ThemeLive Theme features to make unlocking apps even more fun! Much safer for you to lock apps* Fingerprint Lock: Operation is more convenient and fasterï¼ˆThe premise is that your phone hardware supports fingerprint unlockingï¼‰* Lock screen timeout* Lock 3G, 4G data, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and more* Lock new apps* Uninstallation Prevention* Set Lock Time to only activate lock at certain time* Easy-to-use and user friendly GUIâ€”â€”How it Worksâ€”â€”â–  Download and install the Transparent Pattern Lock.â–  Go in setting and enable the lock.â–  Set your pattern.â–  To unlock draw your pattern and you open the lock and see you home screen.â€”â€”Permissionsâ€”â€”Administrator permissionFor new users, please follow the instructions and authorize permissions for AppLock to work. desc: App Hider is the best app for hiding other apps on GooglePlay, especially for WhatsApp Instagram and Facebook Messenger. App Hider is also an excellent app cloner for you to access multiple accounts from one device. More than that App Hider can hide photos and videos and hide App Hider itself by turn itself into a Calculator. Our Featrues:â˜… Hide Apps - Import app into App Hider which you want to hide and then uninstall that app from your Home system. - Extremely optimized for social apps like: Whatsapp Instagram Facebook Messenger Telegram and etc.â˜… Clone Apps (Dual Apps)- Access multiple accounts of your social media (Whatsapp Facebook...) from one device.- You can go multiple accounts with your favorite game on only one device.- Not like other app cloners our clones can run without the original app installed on your device.â˜… Hide Photos (Hide Pictures) Hide Videos- Import your photos to our hidden gallery from your gallery- View and play your hidden photos and videos directly from App Hiderâ˜… Hide Myself- App Hider can turn itself into a Calculator Vault to protect your privacy in App Hider.- The Calculator Vault is a real Calculator and if you input the right password into the calculator... Boom App Hider home shown up.â˜… 64-bits Supported- For some users of WhatsApp and Telegram. You need to install a tiny support library to run WhatsApp and Telegram which is only on 64-bits mode.- 64bits supports library https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.hider.helper.hider64helperâ˜… Android 8 Oreo supported How to hide app?- Import the app which you want to hide into App Hider.- Launch the cloned app in app hider to make sure the clone is working well.- Uninstall the origin app from your device. Now you can only launch that app from App hiderDoes every app can be cloned in App Hider?- We are not sure because we can not test them all. But you can try just dual the app dual Whatsapp dual Facebook. You will lose nothing trying to dual the apps.- Feel free to email us swiftwifistudio@gmail.com If you find some app is not working properly with App Hider Why there is notifications comes from the hiden or dual WhatsApp?- You can switch off the hidden app notification from our App Hider setting.How to hide app hider itself? - Tap Protect App Hider icon in App Hider Home- Setup your password.- Then in several minutes. App Hider will turn into a Calculator.- Open the Calculator and tap your password then your App Hider Home show up.Why App Hider in my Settings->Applications when it already turns into a Calculator vault?- Settings show the default icon and name of an application. - To avoiding that you can download https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.calculator.vault.hider       which has almost the same features of App Hider.If you have any question about App hider feel free to email SwiftWifiStudio@gmail.com.Whatsapp feedback group:https://chat.whatsapp.com/8w7XTsT1JYlB8TCMdne0QN

desc: Swift for Facebook Lite  is a free, customizable, fully functional, lite alternative for both Facebook lite and messenger which allows you to chat, call, video call with your Facebook friends, send emoticon, videos, images, gift, browse newsfeed, comments, etc...  and protect your privacy.â˜… Not battery and memory hoggingâ˜…- Swift for Facebook lite only takes a small amount of storage after installing compared to hundred of MB by the official apps- Background connection to Facebook server is optimized- Swift for Facebook lite uses no more than 20MB RAM- Introduce a simplified Facebook layout- Having a built-in messenger, you can call, message to your Facebook friends. No need 2 separate apps!â˜… Respect you privacy â˜…- Login and chat instantly using Facebook account with public profile (we don't need this but it's default by Facebook)- Swift for Facebook lite requires only a handful of permissions- Please take a look at our privacy policy at the end of this page for more informationâ˜… Very smart  and easy to useâ˜…- Having both Facebook lite and messenger in a small app- Swift for Facebook lite is integreated with Facebook notification server. We make sure that you never miss a message.- Compatible with older Android version- Swift for Facebook lite allows you to send images and download videos from Facebook- Video call and voice call with Facebook friends (for Android 5 and later)Totally free!If you like Swift for Facebook lite, give 5 stars and leave comments or suggest us any features.Follow Swift for Facebook lite on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/swiftfaceb00k/Please join our beta test for exciting new functionsSwift for Facebook lite is an alternative app and is no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook. "Facebook" is a trademark of Facebook, Inc.**** Notice *** 2. Ads. We need to feed our cat :| You can only upgrade or share the app to remove ads. 3: If you .cannot upload image, video, files, go to Settings -> select Enable upload by Graph API (There are alot of other things on Settings)4. Sometimes you cannot tag friends (disable by Facebook): go to settings -> enable Upload by graph API and workaround for tagging. Just because Facebook doesnt allow.

desc: With Unseen, your contacts wonâ€™t know that your are reading their messages.Want to read but donâ€™t want to reply?Itâ€™s time to recover back your privacy on social networks and chat apps. You have now the freedom to read your friendsâ€™ messages incognito, without leaving any seen notices or blue check marks, and it works with most popular Chat Apps such as Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram, Line, VKâ€¦ and many more!This last seen hider is very easy to use: when you receive a message from one of the supported Chat Apps, it will also be displayed in Unseen. There, you can read it whenever you want, without having any of your friends knowing that you have seen it.Donâ€™t bother removing the internet connection or activating offline mode anymore: Unseen provides a simple yet beautiful design and makes it easily to sort and access your messages.READ YOUR MESSAGES INCOGNITO- Hide seen notices and blue ticks for all of your favorite Chat Apps- Read chat messages invisibly and incognito, without your friends knowing- Listen your your audio files and preview your photos and videosSIMPLICITY & EFFICIENCY- All your favorite Chat messages gathered in one place, where you can finely sort them- Enable or disable Unseen for your selected Chat Apps only- Chat heads for quick message overview and multitaskingSUPPORTED CHAT APPSâ— Messengerâ— WhatsAppâ— Instagramâ— Viberâ— Telegramâ— KakaoTalkâ— Lineâ— Imoâ— VKFinally! No more read receipts, no check marks, no blue double ticks or last seen!We hope that youâ€™ll enjoy Unseen as much as we do.We would love to hear back what you think of Unseen, please leave us a comment and don't hesitate to contact us at contact@nolastseen.com. desc: Why sacrifice form or function when you can have both? Swipe is the smoothest, slickest Facebook alternative app out there, integrating Facebook's light mobile website into a familiar user interface that is much like the official app.What you get is a lightweight, highly customizable, and battery-friendly alternative app that emphasizes on user interface and user experience as much as functionality and design.It's better in every single way.  You'll feel it.Here's why you should be using Swipe today:â€¢ Facebook & Messenger in just one appâ€¢ Messenger Chatheads - access your messages while using other appsâ€¢ PIP Videos - watch videos while you browse your News Feedâ€¢ Facebook Widgets - let your notifications and messages live on your home screenâ€¢ Block intrusive ads on your feed and timelineâ€¢ Sort your news feed by Most Recentâ€¢ Mark all notifications as readâ€¢ Save what matters most with Swipe's bookmarksâ€¢ Gorgeous Material Design themes with hand-picked color palettesâ€¢ Automatic day/night themingâ€¢ Intuitive layouts with top and bottom bar optionsâ€¢ Take control of your notifications with filtering and quiet hoursâ€¢ Download images and videosâ€¢ Control your privacy with PIN and Fingerprint Lockâ€¢ Available in 30 different languages!Pro version available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.happening.studios.swipeforfacebookproFor any more bugs or feedback, please go through the app's settings and press the Bug Report button.

desc: Free, lightweight, and works in all network conditions.Built as an extension of the light mobile website, it preserves your battery, storage and data, while giving you back control over your news feedIs an app that help you stay in touch with your friends every time, every where. The best messenger app for low memory devices. ? Save battery and memory ?- Only 2.65MB and 15MB roughly after installing- Background connection to server is optimized to save battery- Simplify layout to save your battery? Smart and easy to use?- Push notifications to make sure that you never miss a message- Compatible with older Android version- Video call and voice call with friends (for Android 5 and later)- Login and chat instantly using account with public profile- Please take a look at our privacy policy at the end of this page for more informationFeatures and How to use:- Browse newsfeed and messages with full functions but saving more time and device space. Nothing difficult, just login and browse news and message like using original application- Find new friends nearby your location. First, you need to allow Lite getting your location, then click menu Find New Nearby Friends, Lite will help you do the rest.- Find new friends over the world: Click menu Find New Random Friends, Lite will help you find random new friends over the world. You can browser their profile, send friend invitation, message themâ€¦ or do everything you allowed to do.This application is NOT official applicationFinally, thanks for your using, if you have any question or feedback, please write it here, we will check it usually and improve Lite better day by day. Thank you so much!

desc: VIPole secure messaging and collaboration app protects your privacy against interceptions and eavesdropping. All data including video, calls, all shared files are encrypted end-to-end with strong cryptographic algorithms. The server has no access to the user data, which means that disclosing it to anyone is technically impossible. ENCRYPTED PRIVATE MESSAGING AND GROUP CHATSChat secure as easy as any other chat, the core difference is strong encryption that is a part of all data transmission and storage processes. VIPole is the best private messenger for increasing team productivity, as encrypted chat rooms organize securely the workflows of different departments and project groups.SECURE AUDIO AND VIDEO CALLS Make crystal-clear audio and video calls encrypted end-to-end. IP masking and changing your voice tone during calls can make all you conversations even more confidential.AUDIO AND VIDEO CONFERENCE CALLS With encrypted conferencing for 9 people, VIPole is a handy tool for connecting remote team members. Make secure multiuser calls a part of your daily business interactions.SHARING ANY FILE AND MANAGING FILES Make your docflows easy and secure, as all photos, media files, archives and docs that you send in VIPole are encrypted on devices, on servers and in transit and synched so that you can reach them anytime, anywhere.HISTORY EDITING AND CLEARING Secure communication means that you can always change your mind and take it back. Erase messages, set autoburn mode, edit them or delete the conversation completely and irrevocably â€“ the history will be changed respectively on the devices of your contacts.CONTACT LIST MANAGEMENT AND HIDDEN CONTACTSConfidential communication is designed for your personal affairs only. Limit the number of people you want to see in your contact list, as you are too busy for any kind of negativity in your life. No advertisers, spammers or meddlers can bother you here. Make lists of hidden contacts and blacklists when necessary. PASSWORD MANAGER Account details for all devices, social media, credit cards, software licenses and subscriptions â€“ everything requires passwords. VIPole password manager takes a load off your mind â€“ store and organize passwords, access them on all devices and share them securely.ENCRYPTED NOTES Message encryption is useful, but sometimes you need to make marginal notes for yourself, not your friends. You no longer need a special app for this â€“ VIPole will store your ideas encrypted and inaccessible to everyone but you.SECURITY EXTENSIONS Remote control of self-connections allows to disconnect the unattended devices. Auto lock and auto logout on inactivity protect your conversations from prying eyes â€“ just set the preferable period prior to disconnection.CHEAP INTERNATIONAL CALLS Stay connected with friends outside VIPole, we offer the best international calling rates.USE ON ANY DEVICEConnect simultaneously using all your devices on Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, iOS and of course Android!____________________________________________________________________________________Visit our Help center and Knowledge base: https://www.vipole.com/supportContact support service: https://www.vipole.com/feedback

desc: Your Facebook app should work for you. It should be light, functional and beautiful. It should look how you want it and be accessible everywhere, with lightning fast launch speeds. Metal does this. And more.And now it supports Twitter, too. Two social networks, one tiny app.What is Metal?If you're looking for a battery efficient alternative to the Facebook app, Metal is for you.  It's a Web wrapper with some awesome enhancements you don't get from just a browser like Notifications, Floating windows and Themes.Love Metal? Upgrade to Metal Pro for Facebook. Download it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nam.fbwrapper.pro* XDA App of the week* androidplanet.nl App of the WeekHave a problem? Report it herehttps://plus.google.com/communities/111788662490973067803instead of leaving a 1 star review. It helps me fix the problem and make it worth 5 stars to you! METAL BAR + METAL EVERYWHERE:Access your messages, news feed and notifications from anywhere effortlessly. Swipe down the notifications bar and tap an icon. Metal Everywhere opens, allowing you to browse Facebook in a convenient floating window, while you wait for a game to load or a photo to download.COMPLETELY AD-FREE:Metal is for you, forever. Enjoy Facebook without any advertisements, anywhere. It keeps your data usage low and your experience the best possible.(Facebook may offer you sponsored content as part of your feed)FIXED TOOLBAR & FULL SCREEN MODEMore content, less distractions. Browse Facebook and Twitter with ease using Metal's enhancements.NOTIFICATIONS:Get notified from those you care about. Easy to set up and easy to use. Metal automatically obtains notifications from Facebook allows you to customise ringtone and vibration.THEMES & DARK MODE:Browse Facebook your way. Dark mode makes everything dark. Or use White, a flat and beautiful theme. Or use the default Facebook Blue.ALL YOUR FAVORITE FEATURES:It's light (Just 3MB), and supports data-saving features and Orbot/Tor.Metal is an alternative app and is no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook. "Facebook" is a trademark of Facebook, Inc.

desc: Chat and find new friends now with ChatGum. Our chat rooms will help you stay connected and discover new friends nearby or around the world. Find and connect with people who share similar interests.The ChatGum community is organized by topic specific chat rooms. Whatever you are passionate about, we have a chat room for you. After you find a room you like, you can start chatting with like-minded people. Every message you send to the chat room will be read by the group currently online in the room.  For a more personal touch, send a private message!Express yourself and show the world who you really are.Interact with people in chat by moving around with your avatar. Use colorful and animated emojis to express your feelings without words.  Sending text messages using ChatGum's Private Messenger is fast and fun.Use our private messaging service to text new friends or keep in touch with family. Messenger delivers all messages instantly, without needing to refresh. However, if your friends are offline, you can still send them messages with fun emojis. They will be receive a notification and can text back later. Engage in in-depth discussions in our forum.Sometimes conversations are best in message board format. Each chat room has their own forum, in which friends can discuss topics they are interested in. Our forums are a great way to start long conversations  without needing to online at the same time. Simply pick a topic, and decide to post a message, emoji or participate in a discussion.  You can also like messages to show your support. Liking a message will also save it so you can read later. Be more social and share things you like with people worldwide.ChatGum is a great way to grow your social network. Customize your profile, upload a selfie and fill out your bio with cool emojis to show the world what you are interested in. You can gauge your popularity by how many users have liked your profile.This chat app is 100% Free, and does not charge for unlimited chatting or texting. All you need is a mobile phone or tablet with a stable internet connection, (WiFi, 3G, 4G or LTE ), and you can start chatting now.Connect with ChatGum!Follow us on Instagram - https://instagram.com/make.friendsFollow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/MobileChatAppLike us on Facebook - https://facebook.com/ChatGumChatGum is only available for users ages 13 and over. Please review our terms of use, and safety statement in the private policy link below.

desc: You will LOVE n-gage messengerâ€¦n-gage encourages creative, personalised messaging and unrivalled privacy so you can still have fun whilst staying in complete control of your content. In addition, by choosing n-gage you are helping sick, disabled, and underprivileged people as we support many charitable causes around the world.n-gage: The first lifestyle messenger app thatâ€™s Private, Playful, and Transforming Lives.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because it has over 15 unique privacy features designed to keep you in control of your content.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because you can set up a â€˜Secret Areaâ€™ to store all your sensitive contacts, messages, and images.You will LOVE n-gage messenger if youâ€™ve ever experienced senderâ€™s regret. With n-gage messenger you can use â€˜Extractâ€™ to call back your messages or even entire conversations.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because you can make sure your message is read by the right person by password protecting it with â€˜Safe Chatâ€™.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because you can auto delete a message once someone has read it using our â€˜Blinkâ€™ feature.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because it has end to end encryption of messages on your phone and in transit as standard; the ability to scramble your chats to stop snoopers and the option to prevent copying, forwarding, sharing or taking screenshots; n-gage is the must have Lifestyle Messenger that keeps you in control.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because of has a lot of playful personalisation features waiting for you to discover and enjoy; n-gage enables you to express yourself in a whole new way!You will LOVE n-gage messenger because you can change the look of the app using â€˜App Makeoversâ€™ to reflect your mood; or â€˜Chat Makeoversâ€™ to set a theme for a conversation that expresses your emotions.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because it brings your messages to life with fun & playful features such as Stickers, Greeting Cards, and Doodle Plus.Still want more?You will LOVE n-gage messenger because even if your friends donâ€™t have n-gage you can make Video Calls and send messages to your connections on WhatsApp, Facebook, Hike, and others.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because you can arrange 1-to-1 and group video calls with anyone. Just set a date and time, and invite up to 10 friends to join!You will LOVE n-gage messenger if you are frustrated with irrelevant group messages that you are not interested in. With n-gage, you can divide groups into separate conversations so you only interact with the chats that interest you.You will LOVE n-gage messenger because by purchasing Premium Features you are helping to transform the lives of sick, disabled, and underprivileged people around the world.Weâ€™d love to hear what you LOVE about n-gage, please rate us & leave a review.Note: The use of features on n-gage messenger are subject to the n-gage terms of service which can be found on http://www.n-gage.com. For cross platform calling, participants would either need n-gage messenger, Android version 4.3 and above, browser with WebRTC support or an additional iOS plugin.

desc: AppLock Pattern Theme - Plane âœˆï¸  belongs to the main application of AppLock, please download it at firstï¼ What is AppLock ï¼Ÿ AppLock is a light app protector tool to protect your privacy in mobile apps. â˜… AppLock can lock Facebook, Whatsapp, Gallery, Messenger, SMS, Contacts, Gmail, Settings, incoming calls and any app you choose. Prevent unauthorized access and guard privacy. Ensure security.â˜… AppLock has PIN and Pattern lock, choose your favorite style to lock apps . Pattern lock is more easier and faster to unlock . desc: Voice call is now available on Catfiz!Catfiz is a lightweight but powerfull messenger. Featuring combination of secure instant messaging, social-media interaction, storage service and multimedia streaming.* PRIVACY : - No phone number exposed  - Can use NIC number or ID - Communicate only with friends or from your Contacts list.- Block / Blacklist selected contact * RICH INTERACTION- UPDATES tab gives you timeline of friend's activities related to 'status' and 'profile picture' - Give more expression by commenting on their status, quoting their  message and give 'like'. - Emoticon, Emoji, Sticker also available * BIGGER NEED- Send/share 'any' file message up to 500 MB- 2000 Group member* EASY TO SHARE CONTENT- All files that appear in chats or groups are instantly ready to forward as a link. - Download only when you need or save the link to FIZZLINK internal cloud storage list.* STREAMING - SAVE YOUR MEMORY !- Direct PLAY. No need to download large multimedia. - Stream from the beginning, middle or end of your media file. - You can download it later while on wi-fi. * COMPLETE FUNCTION- Photo messages and share, - Voice message and Video message, - Message delivery status (queue, sent, delivered, read),* Sync your phone book contacts to add to you friend recommendation list, so you can add them easily. Use Catfiz for personal, official, community or larger organization Be a part of Catfiz and enjoy true messenger experience with friends.
